channel.title: software on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in software on FinanClub

item.title: PATH
item.description: score:423 Chances: UiPath is well positioned to have a phenomenal decade. UiPath and CrowdStrike will continue their 2023 success into the new year. UiPath did an excellent job in 2023, accelerating revenue and controlling costs. Market catalysts and internal growth make it likely that these stocks will continue to rally in 2024.

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:27 Chances: Nokia is actively managing its Cloud and Network Services (CNS) business group portfolio in order to invest in other strategic areas and enhance technology leadership. Nokia Technologies segment is expanding its patent licensing business and reintroducing the Nokia brand to smartphones through brand licensing.
